name: PieGame
description:
In this game you will bake delicious pies for hungry tourists. The tourists will buy your pie and eat it because they are hungry.

HOW TO PLAY

Left Click + Drag and drop items from your inventory into an input slot.

Left click on knife or spoon to perform chopping or mixing action.

CHOPPING

Only certain items can be chopped. After dragging the ingredient to the input slot, repeatedly press the knife to chop it. The result will be automatically added to your inventory. Attempting to input a non-choppable ingredient will return the item to your inventory.

MIXING

Any combination of ingredients may be combined to make an output, but only specific combinations will produce any output. As soon as you drag an ingredient to the input slot, it will be permenently removed from your inventory. Once you are happy with the items you have added, press the green tick to start mixing. If you are unhappy with the input, press the trash to clear the bowl. Repeatedly press the spoon to mix the ingredients. If the ingredients combination is valid, the result will be automatically added to your inventory.

FEED TOURISTS

Any ingredients in your inventory may be given to tourists. However, base ingredients (such as sugar, flour, water) will yield low money amounts compared to combined ingredients (such as apple pie, cherry pie).

THE GOAL

You must make as much money as possible by giving the pies you create to tourists.
